column4: does it exist any good books and/or videos about Ubuntu 12.04  for people who are clinging on the windows 7 and hates windows 8? i have just installed ubuntu 12.04 on my home computer and my poor wife is not familiar with it
there's the official ubuntu book, which does a decent intro
oh, you'll want http://www.amazon.com/The-Official-Ubuntu-Book-Edition/dp/0133017605/ref=dp_ob_title_bk instead. They're up to edition 7
